tab1.text1:
Here is some information about the server.

<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">Server configuration:</>

- PVE game mode.
- Maximum wild dino level: 300
- Cave and airdrop loot are increased.
- Weight for player and dino are limited.
- No fall damage.
- You don't lose your equipment if you die.
- You can increase the speed of the flying dino.
- Lots of new dino with Primal mod.
- Ample items at 10kk.
- You have a shop and kits available.
- You can track any dino with SHIFT+F8.

<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">Different multipliers on the server:</>

- Gathers: x100
- Mating: x10
- Breeding/Egg: x10
- XP: x10
- Loot Quality: x100
- Crops: x10

<RichColor Color="1, 0.65, 0, 1">If you want more information about the server, don't hesitate to ask your questions on the discord.</>

tab2.text1:
Here are a few rules to follow on <RichColor Color="0,0.25,0.75,1">HydraLands</>:

1. No insult, cheat, glitch, racism, grief, undermesh.
2. No construction to block resources, spawns or cellars.
3. Avoid setting up too close to other people to avoid structural restrictions.
4. Avoid gigantic bases 30x30 maximum for the good of the server and players passing by your base.
5. No discriminating or offensive nicknames, even on dino names.
6. Have fun!

<RichColor Color="1, 1, 0, 1">Please respect these rules for everyone's sake and enjoy the game!</>
